name: 2 Pack Wire Brushes for Cleaning-Heavy Duty Stainless Steel Wire Scratch Brush for Metal Rust Cleaning,Paint Scrubbing with Rubber Covered Handle
short_description: 【Strong Durability】The stainless steel wire brush is made of high-quality stainless steel, so it has excellent durability. Even under heavy use, it can maintain its shape and performance, and is not easily damaged.

【Good Cleaning Effect】The steel wire of the stainless steel wire brush is very sturdy and can easily remove various stains and stubborn dirt. It can be used to clean kitchen utensils, ovens, grills, wheels, floors, etc.

【Widely Use】Stainless steel wire brushes can be used for various cleaning tasks, such as cleaning iron pots, grills, porcelain, tableware, etc. It can also be used for tasks such as removing rust, cutting, and polishing metals.
【Size】The wire brush is made of stainless steel and silicone，total length 6.3 inch / 16 cm.
